{CustomPotionColor:0,CustomPotionEffects:[{Amplifier:4b,Duration:1200,Id:2},{Amplifier:3b,Duration:0,Id:6},{Amplifier:3b,Duration:0,Id:7},{Amplifier:8b,Duration:1200,Id:19},{Amplifier:8b,Duration:1200,Id:20}],Potion:"minecraft:harming",display:{Lore:['{"text":"Particles of this brew seem to attract","italic":true}','{"text":"and asimilate nearby objects.","italic":true}','{"text":"Its name is purely metaphorical.","italic":true}'],Name:'{"text":"Black Hole in a Bottle","italic":false}'}}

{CustomPotionColor:0,CustomPotionEffects:[{Amplifier:1b,Duration:9600,Id:25}],Potion:"minecraft:harming",display:{Lore:['{"text":"Some people describe its effects","italic":true}','{"text":"as incredibly light and liberating.","italic":true}','{"text":"But captives always spill out the","italic":true}','{"text":"truth when they\'re high enough.","italic":true}'],Name:'{"text":"Will O\' The Beer","italic":false}'}}
